trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lake Villa
There were no other sightings in Lake Villa on or around July 24th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsappears in NW 50 to 60 degrees above horizon at 9pm moving slightly more north. Bright white light decends by 9:30pm to horizon. Reappears around midnight in same area with multicolors and tight movements. Larger then stars in the same area. Doesn't appear when clouds are present. Viewed through 50mm binoculors in backyard. Object present for the past month. First thought it was the planet Venus, but does not appear as a planet or star.
Summary: Appears at 9pm and decends at 9:30pm, reappears around 12pm with vibrant colors and movement and decends within 1/2 hr if no cloud cover
